channel.title: General Humor Music on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Humor Music on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: she wants revenge is my new favorite band.
item.description: however.. there is one downside.. the songs do sound the same. but mike said it best: Mike Compton: wtf, every one of these songs sounds the same Home Aim: haha Mike Compton: i was all “wow, this is a long song” it was actually already on track 3 hehe. LUNCH TIME!
